DOC.brief_title: Smoking Cessation Women With Gynecological Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This study allow woman serious gynecological condition sample traditional nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) Electronic Nicotine Delivery Systems ( electronic cigarette , ENDS ) . Whether woman sample NRT ENDS first randomize . Women choose product wish try 6-week intervention period smoke cessation . Women choose NRT receive 6-week intervention daily nicotine patch plus either nicotine gum lozenge use ( need ) throughout day . The ENDS group receive electronic cigarette device refill last 6-week duration study . Both group receive identical tobacco cessation counseling . As part study , subject complete survey conduct baseline , 6-weeks study intervention , upon completion 6 week follow-up period participant receive intervention . At 12-week measurement period add qualitative interview allow u ask woman whether method acceptable , cause problem , , problem entail .
